item.title: Poker
item.description: My first poker simulation was created in Python, where it accepts any number of players from the command line and accordingly prompts the user for their names. It then creates a list from the user input and passes it onto another class, Game, where the winner is determined. In the Game class, a deck is constructed as a list of tuples where each tuple represents a card. A tuple is made up of its number and suit.
